mapper.insert: insert into t_common_collect (f_uid, f_rid, f_type) values (#{fUid}, #{fRid}, #{fType});
mapper.delete: delete from t_common_collect where f_rid=#{fRid} and f_uid=#{fUid} and f_type=#{fType};
mapper.select: select * from t_common_collect where f_rid=#{fRid} and f_uid=#{fUid} and f_type=#{fType};
select count(*) from t_common_collect where f_rid=#{fRid} and f_type=1;
select count(*) from t_common_collect where f_rid=#{fRid} and f_type=2;
